synopsis.text:
Realizing the potential of his sharp intellect and cunning demeanor, Ryuuichi Kaizu, a high school student, sets his sights on conquering Tokyo's elite circles. With a relentless ambition that knows no bounds, he is driven by an insatiable desire for wealth and power. To further his goals, Ryuuichi manipulates his relationships, using people as mere pawns in his game of social ascension.

When he receives an unexpected gift from Emi Naito, a girl hailing from a prestigious family, Ryuuichi sees an opportunity to advance his agenda. Unbeknownst to Emi, she becomes another target in Ryuuichi's web of deceit, as he skillfully navigates their relationship to his advantage.

Determined to leave his humble beginnings behind, Ryuuichi is willing to resort to any means necessary to reach the top. Unsatisfied by his current status, he seeks to continually surpass himself, whether it be through amassing wealth or engaging in romantic conquests. With unwavering resolve, Ryuuichi embarks on a ruthless journey to secure his place among Tokyo's elite, leaving behind a trail of broken hearts and shattered dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
